name: ダライアスII
summary: Darius II (ダライアスII Daraiasu Tsū) is a 1989 arcade video game developed by Taito. It is the direct sequel to the 1987 Darius. It was later released as Sagaia (サーガイア Sāgaia) in Japan in 1991 for the Game Boy as well as non-Japanese ports. A remake was released for the PC Engine Super CD-ROM² as Super Darius II (スーパーダライアスII Sūpā Daraiasu Tsū) in 1993.
